readme.name: README.md
readme.content: Displays a list of products on the checkout summary step, which includes name, quantity, options and price.

definitions.name: data
definitions.contract:
name: required,
    quantity: required,
    price: 0,
    options: [],
    bundleItems: [],
    quantitySalesUnit: null,
    amountSalesUnit: null,
    amount: 0,
